publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4807 Jackie Baillie: The Loch Lomond Food and Drink Festival—That the Parliament welcomes the second Loch Lomond Food and Drink Festival being held at Lomond Shores from 17 to 19 September 2006; congratulates the organisers for the success of last year’s event which was visited by 25,000 people; believes that the wide range of activities including whisky tasting, the real ale festival, the chocolate extravaganza, the Loch Fyne oysters and champagne bar, the farmers’ market and cookery demonstrations from some of the country’s top chefs, will attract more visitors than before, and acknowledges that festivals such as this are vital to our tourism industry and promote the best that Scotland has to offer in food, drink and scenery.
S2M-4807 The Loch Lomond Food and Drink Festival (lodged on 15 September 2006) Alex Johnstone*
